name: CQ.form.FormWrapper
doc:
A simple html form wrapper that allows for general submit handling
with the beforesubmit event wh...

configs.name: form
configs.doc: DOM form element to wrap (Element) or ID/name of a form element

props.name: formEl
props.doc: CQ.Ext.Element for the form element (caching member). Could be null.

methods.name: addHiddenField
methods.doc: Adds a hidden input field to the form.

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.
